description: Explore how the Arbitrum sequencer is transforming Ethereum by alleviating congestion and high fees through Layer 2 scaling. Discover its benefits, challenges, and future prospects in the blockchain ecosystem.
keywords: Arbitrum, Ethereum, Layer 2 scaling, optimistic rollups, blockchain technology, transaction fees, scaling solution, Arbitrum sequencer
title: Arbitrum Sequencer: Transforming Ethereum's Capabilities
